text: bola hananimkkeseo neohuiege yagsoghasa du mulijung-e hanaga neohui ui geos-i doege halila hasyeoss-eumae neo huineun mujanghaji anihan geos-i neohui ui geos-i doegileul wonham-ila geuliha yeo hananim-eun tteus-eul dusa jinlileul geu bun-ui malsseum-eulo jinsildoege hasini midji anihan jadeul-ui ppulileul geunjeol hasim-ila
